com.haru

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.haru.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable, JsonEncodable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Installation, User

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements JsonEncodable, android.os.Parcelable
    서버에 저장되거나, 로컬에 저장되는 데이터이다. The data that stored into the Haru server or local datastore.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable
